00077 bool post_act() {
00078  string pass, step;
00079  // check data with the posted one, may be we don't have to select all this stuff
00080  cgi_var(cgi, "area", ui.area_id);
00081  cgi_var(cgi, "work", ui.work_id);
00082  cgi_var(cgi, "edu", ui.edu_id);
00083  cgi_var(cgi, "sex", ui.sex_id);
00084  cgi_var(cgi, "country", ui.country);
00085  cgi_var(cgi, "city", ui.city);
00086  cgi_var(cgi, "birthday", ui.birthday);
00087  cgi_var(cgi, "re_ans", ui.re_ans);
00088 #define spec_dec(x) x = html_spec_dec(x)
00089  spec_dec(ui.country);
00090  spec_dec(ui.city);
00091  spec_dec(ui.birthday);
00092  spec_dec(ui.re_ans);
00093 #undef spec_dec
00094 
00095  if( ! ui.area_id.empty() && ! ui.work_id.empty() 
00096      && ! ui.edu_id.empty() && ! ui.sex_id.empty()
00097      && ! ui.country.empty() && ! ui.city.empty()
00098      && ! ui.birthday.empty() && ! ui.re_ans.empty()
00099      && db->ui_cmp_by_name(ui) == cdbdaemon::err_no 
00100      && db->user_pass_get(di.name, ui.login, pass) == cdbdaemon::err_no ) {
00101    *o<<"<step2 pass=\""<< pass <<"\"/>";
00102    return true;
00103  }
00104 
00105  // select works, edus, etc. and let user choose it
00106  vector<cdbdaemon::domain_info> domains;
00107  vector<cdbdaemon::edu_info> edu_levs;
00108  vector<cdbdaemon::work_info> works;
00109  vector<cdbdaemon::area_info> areas;
00110  vector<cdbdaemon::sex_info> sexes;
00111 
00112  if( db->edu_ls(edu_levs) != cdbdaemon::err_no
00113      || db->work_ls(works) != cdbdaemon::err_no
00114      || db->area_ls(areas) != cdbdaemon::err_no
00115      || db->sex_ls(sexes) != cdbdaemon::err_no
00116      || db->ui_re_que_get_by_name(di.id, ui.login, ui.re_que) != cdbdaemon::err_no ) return false;
00117  *o<<"<step1>";
00118  
00119  if( ! cgi_var(cgi, "step", step) || step != "0" ) {
00120    *o<<"<matchno/>"; 
00121  }
00122          
00123  *o<<"<email val=\"" << email << "\"/>";
00124  *o<<"<re_que val=\"" << ui.re_que << "\"/>";
00125  *o<<"<edu>";
00126  for( vector<cdbdaemon::edu_info>::const_iterator beg = edu_levs.begin(), 
00127       end=edu_levs.end(); beg!=end; ++beg ) {
00128          *o<<"<lev id=\"" << beg->id <<"\" name=\"" << beg->name <<"\"";
00129          if( ui.edu_id == beg->id ) *o<<" sel=\"1\" ";
00130          *o<<"/>";
00131  }
00132  *o<<"</edu>";
00133  *o<<"<works>";
00134  for( vector<cdbdaemon::work_info>::const_iterator beg = works.begin(), 
00135       end=works.end(); beg!=end; ++beg ) {
00136          *o<<"<work id=\"" << beg->id <<"\" name=\"" << beg->name <<"\"";
00137          if( ui.work_id == beg->id ) *o<<" sel=\"1\" ";
00138          *o<<"/>";
00139  }
00140  *o<<"</works>";
00141  *o<<"<areas>";
00142  for( vector<cdbdaemon::area_info>::const_iterator beg=areas.begin(),
00143       end=areas.end(); beg!=end; ++beg ) {
00144          *o<<"<area id=\""<< beg->id <<"\" name=\""<< beg->name <<"\"";
00145          if( ui.area_id == beg->id ) *o<<" sel=\"1\" ";
00146          *o<<"/>";
00147  }
00148  *o<<"</areas>";
00149  *o<<"<sexes>";
00150  for( vector<cdbdaemon::sex_info>::const_iterator beg=sexes.begin(),
00151       end=sexes.end(); beg!=end; ++beg ) {
00152          *o<<"<sex id=\"" << beg->id <<"\" name=\""<< beg->name <<"\"";
00153          if( ui.sex_id == beg->id ) *o<<" sel=\"1\" ";
00154          *o<<"/>";
00155  }
00156  *o<<"</sexes>";
00157 #define spec_enc(x,y) *o<<"<" x " val=\"" << html_spec_enc(y) << "\"/>"
00158  spec_enc("country", ui.country);
00159  spec_enc("city", ui.city);
00160  spec_enc("birthday", ui.birthday);
00161  spec_enc("re_ans", ui.re_ans);
00162 #undef spec_enc
00163 
00164  *o << "</step1>";
00165  return true;
00166 }

00171 void start( int ac, char **av, ostream & o, ostream & e, xslt_args_type & ) {
00172     // setup
00173     me = *av;
00174     ::o = &o;
00175     ::e = &e;
00176     
00177     if(!sig_pipeign()) throw runtime_error("can't setup signal handler for SIGPIPE");
00178             
00179     cgi = new Cgicc();
00180     cgie = cgi->getElements().end();
00181     ce = & cgi->getEnvironment();
00182     
00183     o<<"<vqrescue>";
00184     cgi_var(cgi, "email", email );
00185     cgi_var(cgi, "locale", localeinfo);
00186     if(localeinfo.empty()) localeinfo = "pl_PL";
00187     if( stringsAreEqual(ce->getRequestMethod(),"POST") ) {
00188       if( ! email.empty() ) {
00189         string::size_type atpos = email.find('@');
00190 
00191         if( atpos != string::npos && ! (ui.login=email.substr(0, atpos)).empty()
00192             && ! (di.name=email.substr(atpos+1)).empty() ) {
00193           db = cdbdaemon::alloc();
00194           // get needed stuff from db
00195           db->locale_set(localeinfo);
00196           if( db->domain_get_by_name(di) == cdbdaemon::err_no ) {
00197             ui.dom_id = di.id;
00198             if( post_act() ) goto start_end;
00199           }
00200         }
00201       }
00202       o<<"<inv><emailno/></inv>";
00203     }
00204 start_end:
00205     o<<"</vqrescue>";
00206 }
